A time travel adventure to a land where night never ends, and the characters must navigate through the challenges of perpetual darkness.
A mythical land where the sun sets forever, and the inhabitants must adapt to the constant darkness by developing unique ways of living and working.
A dystopian world where the sun ised and the people must rely on artificial light and technology to survive.
A land of eternal twilight where the sun is always just above the horizon, casting a soft, ethereal glow over everything.
A fantasy world where the moon is the only source of light, and the characters must find a way to harness its power to overcome the challenges of the night.
